champ_0160_chairman_02:
So, this is it... You’ve decided to face the
Pokémon League.[npcn:11]
champ_0160_chairman_03:
The final test you must pass to become
a Champion...[npcn:11]
champ_0160_chairman_04: is held here in this building.[npcn:11]
champ_0160_chairman_05:
I wish you the best of luck from the bottom of my
heart, [trnm:0].[npcn:11]
champ_0160_chairman_06: I look forward to meeting you again soon.[npcn:11]
